item.title: Cramer's week ahead: Banks kick off critical earnings season
item.description: After President Donald Trump's tariffs crushed stocks, CNBC's Jim Cramer said next week's earnings will provide a look at how CEOs are dealing with th...

item.title: Xiaomi delivers record cars in March as winners emerge in China's EV race
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle startups Xiaomi, Xpeng and Leapmotor each reported in March delivery volumes that were roughly double of their startup compet...

item.title: Tesla reports 13% drop in first-quarter vehicle deliveries from a year ago
item.description: Tesla reported a 13% year-over-year drop in first-quarter deliveries two days after the company's stock wrapped up its worst quarter since 2022.

item.title: Huawei 2024 revenue surges to near-record high as China smartphone comeback takes hold
item.description: Huawei has been trying to adapt its business to deal with U.S. sanctions that have restricted its access to key technologies like semiconductors.

item.title: Lululemon shares drop 15% as CEO says inflation, economic concerns are weighing on spending
item.description: Lululemon beat on earnings but disappointed with its 2025 guidance in its fourth-quarter earnings report.
